title: The first instalment shall not be less than 50 lakhs in case of A, B, C Class Municipal Corporations and 25 lakhs in case of other areas
clause_text: The first instalment shall not be less than 50 lakhs in case of A, B, C Class Municipal Corporations and 25 lakhs in case of other areas. (2) However the Planning Authority may reduce the first instalment limit as a policy by considering local conditions. (2) In such case, the remaining amount shall be apportioned in remaining instalments.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
